sources.title: In Society (1944)
sources.description: Two bumbling plumbers are hired by a socialite to fix a leak. A case of mistaken identity gets the pair an invitation to a fancy party and an entree into high society. As expected, things don't go too smoothly. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/in-society-1944/

metadata.Plot: Two bumbling plumbers are hired by a socialite to fix a leak. A case of mistaken identity gets the pair an invitation to a fancy party and an entree into high society. As expected, things don't go too smoothly.
metadata.Writer: Hugh Wedlock Jr., Howard Snyder, John Grant
metadata.Actors: Bud Abbott, Lou Costello, Marion Hutton
